mapper.sql:
where status != '-1'
and ( dwmc like '%${keyword}%' or zyfzr like '%${keyword}%' or zyyw like '%${keyword}%' or dh like '%${keyword}%' or dz like '%${keyword}%' )
and dwmc like '%${dwmc}%'
and zyfzr like '%${zyfzr}%'
and zyyw like '%${zyyw}%'
and dh like '%${dh}%'
and dz like '%${dz}%'
and yb like '%${yb}%'
and status = #{status}
mapper.select: select id,dwmc,zyfzr,zyyw,dh,dz,yb,bz,addTime,status from dz_nzwzz where status != '-1' order by id desc
select id,dwmc,zyfzr,zyyw,dh,dz,yb,bz,addTime,status from dz_nzwzz order by ${orderby} limit #{start_num,,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{page_size,,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into dz_nzwzz( id, dwmc, zyfzr, zyyw, dh, dz, yb, bz, addTime, status ) values( #{id}, #{dwmc}, #{zyfzr}, #{zyyw}, #{dh}, #{dz}, #{yb}, #{bz}, #{addTime}, #{status} )
mapper.update: update dz_nzwzz set dwmc=#{dwmc}, zyfzr=#{zyfzr}, zyyw=#{zyyw}, dh=#{dh}, dz=#{dz}, yb=#{yb} bz=#{bz}, addTime=#{addTime}, status=#{status} where id=#{id}
update dz_nzwzz set status = #{status} where id in (${ids})
update dz_nzwzz set status = '-1' where id in (${ids})
